snippet.title: Island Time VR - Gameplay Trailer - PSVR, Oculus, Vive, Steam VR
snippet.description:
After a journey at sea, you are shipwrecked on a tiny island. Using your wit, ingenuity and the advice of your new buddy, Carl the Crab, you’ve gotta find a way to keep yourself from starving and survive. Craft tools, fend off creatures, try to signal an airplane… or you could just give up and die? Maybe, just enjoy the sunset while you can. Almost makes you forget that you're in a desperate struggle against your own mortality.

Featuring the voice of Greg Miller of Kinda Funny as Carl The Crab! 🦀

http://islandtimevr.com
http://twitter.com/flightschoolhq
http://facebook.com/flightschoolstudio/
